message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you $200000. Your turn!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority
I'll give you a better deal this time. You'll get $400000. Take it or leave it!
You're still giving me too little, I'll take 7/10
I'll meet you in the middle this time. You'll get $450000. It's a fair deal!
I'm not giving up yet! You'll get $580000. It's my final offer!
I'm taking what's left, you're getting the scraps
Fine, I'll give you most of it. You'll get $800000. Take it!
